properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.COMMENTS: Offenders with developmental disabilities & severe behavior disorders.  Population is borderline to moderately retarded range.  Specialized prgs: Behavioral "token ecomony" prg, Sex Offender & Substance Abuse.

properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.COMMENTS: Male offenders are 15 - 16 years and the females are of all ages.  Specialized prgs: Substance Abuse and Anger Management.

properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.Facility: Oak Ridge Reception and Diagnostic Center
properties.COMMENTS: Intake pt for all juveniles, confinement for 30 days while undergoing various evaluations (medical, academic, psychological, and social).

properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.COMMENTS: Juveniles are from 16 - 21 years old, close custody facility with medium security.  Prgs include Sex Offender Treatment, Substance Abuse, & Anger Management.  College bound  & SAT prgs offered.

properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.COMMENTS: Older and most aggressive offenders are housed here, College Bound and SAT testing prgs are offered.

properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.COMMENTS: All ages with lower security risks, a limited number of major & serious offenders placed here as step-down or transition prior to release.  Specialized prgs: Substance Abuse, Anger Management, & Independent Living.

properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.COMMENTS: All ages, moderate to serious offenses.  Specialized prgs: JROTC, Anger Management, Sex Offenders Treatment, and Substance Abuse Treatment.

properties.TITLE: Superintendent
properties.COMMENTS: Intensive Substance Abuse Treatment Prg, first of its kind in nation to be accredited by the CARF.
